summary: OK, I have to ask this because the promo we got tonight enraged me, and you seem to be rather well versed in GOT/ASOIAF: *deep...
question: OK, I have to ask this because the promo we got tonight enraged me, and you seem to be rather well versed in GOT/ASOIAF: *deep breath* do you think there is ANY CHANCE Dany will win the North over? I'm praying for Political Jon to be true, but I'm worried D&D aren't that smart. I NEED MY STARKS TO BE HAPPY
answer: While it does seem at a first glance that Sansa submitted to Daenerys…if you pay attention the details, it’s quite obvious that Sansa is playing the long game…and that’s she going to win it. I feel like a lot of people forgot about Sansa’s manipulation skills, and her courteous yet also passive-aggressive nature. I don’t blame them, Sansa hadn’t need of any of these in the past few seasons as she has been surrounded by friends and family in a secure environment. However, she now knows that the game has changed, and a new factor is part of it now, so she adapted, and is going to use all of the things she has learned through out her journey in order to make it out on top at the end of all of this. There’s absolutely no chance that Daenerys will permanently get the North. It’s the Starks…but before we get the high for our protagonists (which we all know are the Starks) that will beat all highs, we have to get a low, and Daenerys getting Winterfell and the North to submit to her is that low. So you better prepare for next season, because we’re about to see Sansa win like she never won before.

tags: obviously there's the white walkers and all
but girl is not going to let dany take her families land like that
summary: Have we ever been so fed? Sansa Stark, Queen in the North. No southern dragon will own Winterfell, no while Sansa breathes air.
question: Have we ever been so fed? Sansa Stark, Queen in the North. No southern dragon will own Winterfell, no while Sansa breathes air.
answer:
I am so…

right now. 

Sansa ‘’Winterfell is ours….it belongs to our family, we have to fight for it.’’ Stark is not going to stand down or bend the knee for no scaly gecko. She knows that Winterfell belongs to the Starks, and she’s going to fight for it again if she has to.

summary: I love how Sansa stans are going on about how she is going to be so passive aggressive yet courteous to Dany this season whereas...
body: I love how Sansa stans are going on about how she is going to be so passive aggressive yet courteous to Dany this season whereas Dany stans are going on about how if Sansa voices even the slightest disapproval over their fave and what she has done, their fave is going to roast Sansa alive. We might disagree a lot, but I’m glad we are all on the same page when it comes to knowing who’s the hero and who’s the villain in this situation.

We might disagree a lot, but I’m glad we are all on the same page when it comes to knowing who’s the hero and who’s the villain in this situation.

We might disagree a lot, but I’m glad we are all on the same page when it comes to knowing who’s the hero and who’s the villain in this situation.

summary: can i just point out that sansa is the LADY OF WINTERFELL and the head of the Stark family. Even though jon is the King in the...
body: can i just point out that sansa is the LADY OF WINTERFELL and the head of the Stark family. Even though jon is the King in the North, WINTERFELL is NOT his to give away. Winterfell is SANSA’S, that’s why jon was so nervous; bc he didn’t know whether she would play along and ‘give’ winterfell away. sansa was literally sold like a brood mare, imprisoned, beaten, tortured both mentally and physically, raped and defiled for winterfell/the north. She is giving up her home and everything that she fought for and her family died for. All that to a foreign invader who threatens her, her family and her people. and somehow, SANSA is the bitch…???

blog.name: unpredictablybittersweet
blog.title: Unpredictable. Bittersweet. Unexpected.
blog.description: You are not an artist. You just have big emotions.

tags: i feel better after bitching for two small posts
body:
Deep Thoughts or Something

It’s just legit blowing my mind how people think Sansa is dumb enough to maintain a petty squabble while the world is in the verge of destruction. Of course she’s going to be apprehensive of Daenerys: all she knows about Targaryens is what she’s heard from her family; she’s never actually met one (to her knowledge that is). Sansa has also been totally yanked around and brutalized while trying to live within the rules of being a Lady. Jon also bent the knee to Daenerys without consultation. Of course Sansa isn’t going to be psyched for this change. She’s literally following protocol by repeating what Ned said to King Robert upon his arrival to Winterfell but in a manner that is consistent with someone standing their ground.

On the side of Daenerys: there’s literally nothing smug about her return greeting to Sansa. She’s being distanced and cordial as well. Despite her relationship with Jon, Sansa is still a stranger to Daenerys and a member of a family that overthrew hers. Daenerys is also going to stand her ground and logically so. Her entire life has been spent trying to outrun people trying to kill her or actively betraying her; of course she’s going to be nothing less than distanced and Queenly.

I know some y’all are thirsty for some petty-ass cat fighting but the truth of the matter is these women are being logical and guarded. They’re both crafty and intelligent and will understand that stupid shit will have to be put aside in order to survive against the AOTD and Cersei which are two enemies that could literally kill them all if they don’t work together. “The pack survives” is not all about the Starks (literal wolves) but an overarching theme of the entire narrative. In the unlikely circumstance Sansa tried to totally shoot down Daenerys, everyone will literally die. The only hope for survival is if the Starks and Targaryens band together even further.

summary:
Okay sooo about the new got sneak peak...
I’m team Jonsa all the way and stuff, I love how people analise the trailer, focusing...
body:
Okay sooo about the new got sneak peak…

I’m team Jonsa all the way and stuff, I love how people analise the trailer, focusing on Dany vs Sansa and stuff, but lemme say something about the details we are missing.


1. JORAH

Finally my boy has a new outfit. And the scarf looks great on him. Also I noticed that he has a smirk on his face. Maybe he is glad that he sees his Khaleesi’s new boyfriend hugging another woman? I don’t know, but he seems pleased.

2. DAENERYS

Warning- my opinion

She also has a new outfit and hairstyle. I was always a fan of her clothes, as much as I don’t like her character, I love her warderobe, but daaamn this coat is so ulgy? I’m sorry, but really. Also, it’s fucking useless! Ygritte was almost fully covered by three coats at once and still felt cold and you’re gonna tell me Daenerys, who lived her entire life on the dessert, went behind the wall in WINTER and was totally fine? Unrealistic xp I also don’t like her new hair, seems unnatural to me.

3. BRIENNE

Mama is so protective and proud of Sansa and it shows. She’s not pleased with Dany’s arrival either.


And finally

4. WINTERFELL

Why there’s no snow?? It’s Winter?? It’s snowing in King’s Landing, why the fuck Winterfell looks like a Polish village after the rain??


Sooo these are my observations. Feel free to comment or something, I would love to talk about it with anyone.

I’m team Jonsa all the way and stuff, I love how people analise the trailer, focusing on Dany vs Sansa and stuff, but lemme say something about the details we are missing.


1. JORAH

Finally my boy has a new outfit. And the scarf looks great on him. Also I noticed that he has a smirk on his face. Maybe he is glad that he sees his Khaleesi’s new boyfriend hugging another woman? I don’t know, but he seems pleased.

2. DAENERYS

Warning- my opinion

She also has a new outfit and hairstyle. I was always a fan of her clothes, as much as I don’t like her character, I love her warderobe, but daaamn this coat is so ulgy? I’m sorry, but really. Also, it’s fucking useless! Ygritte was almost fully covered by three coats at once and still felt cold and you’re gonna tell me Daenerys, who lived her entire life on the dessert, went behind the wall in WINTER and was totally fine? Unrealistic xp I also don’t like her new hair, seems unnatural to me.

3. BRIENNE

Mama is so protective and proud of Sansa and it shows. She’s not pleased with Dany’s arrival either.


And finally

4. WINTERFELL

Why there’s no snow?? It’s Winter?? It’s snowing in King’s Landing, why the fuck Winterfell looks like a Polish village after the rain??


Sooo these are my observations. Feel free to comment or something, I would love to talk about it with anyone.

tags: sometimes i hate the internet for exposing me to dumb people
if you want to say why either of them is worse than cersei than thats a dofferent story
AND SANSA AND DANAERYS ARE JUST TRYING TO STAY SAFE AND PROTECT OTHERS
summary: Look I’m not a giant GoT fan and you ship what you ship. However, I exist on the internet and have friends who watch it and have...
body:
Look I’m not a giant GoT fan and you ship what you ship. However, I exist on the internet and have friends who watch it and have forced me to watch a few episodes.

And honestly, if you don’t think that Sansa Stark, an innocent person who trusted the wrong people (Lannisters, Balish) and was subject to abuse by many but eventually rose up, became a better person, and took power to protect herself and those she loved, wouldn’t have at minimum respect for Danaerys Targaryen, an innocent person who trusted the wrong person (brother) and was subject to abuse by many but eventually rose up, used her power for good, and helped innocent people in the name of trying to make the world a better place then seriously do you even watch the show and understand the parallels between the characters? I see a lot of stuff comparing the paths of Jon/Sansa and Jon/Danaeyrs and whether or not those paths actually parallel is something different. But Sansa and Danaeyrs have a lot in common and have experienced similar trajectories and honestly, even if they aren’t friends, I see them developing respect for one another.

Seriously, stop pitting women against one another it’s gross and misogynistic and no shipping war EVER warrants behavior like that. It’s juvenile and if you’re old enough to watch a show that heavily features rape you are old enough to not needlessly pit women against each other.

summary: I can’t wait till Dany and Sansa actually become friends or at the very least allies. You can’t tell me that these two women who...
body:
I can’t wait till Dany and Sansa actually become friends or at the very least allies. You can’t tell me that these two women who have been through hell and back won’t commiserate with each other and appreciate each other’s strength.

I’m sure Sansa is salty af about Jon bending the knee but Sansa is not a stupid girl, she’s smart enough to value a smart alliance.

Imagine Arya and Dany bonding over being women and having to reclaim their power. Sansa and Dany bonding over leadership, their traumatic past, and fashion.

Honestly fuck Jon in this whole situation, I can’t wait to see bad bitches link up.

summary: I just wanna point out the striking contrast between Sansa and Daenerys in the new footage. Here's Dany decked out in white with...
body: I just wanna point out the striking contrast between Sansa and Daenerys in the new footage. Here’s Dany decked out in white with a little red poking through while Sansa is in all dark colors except for her bright red hair. I just think it’s something to think about… Almost like they’re supposed to be foils…

tags: not really just to be safe
summary: Jon seems like he's talking while dany is walking towards them. his body is moving and you can see the fog of his breath. maybe...
question: Jon seems like he's talking while dany is walking towards them. his body is moving and you can see the fog of his breath. maybe he's introducing daenerys as the queen or introducing sansa as his sister...?
answer:
Dear nonny,

I don’t know tbh. We don’t hear anything and I think he could just as easily be inhaling deeply to calm himself down after the long hug that surely had him very excited? 😉

And would we need an introduction? We had none when Robert came to Winterfell, but of course Ned and Cat knew Robert.

Maybe Sansa would need to be introduced since Dany hasn’t heard of her yet? But it would be more natural if Jon was the one to escort Dany forward to be greeted as a guest by the lady of the keep. Instead it is Jorah and Jon has already ‘switched’ sides to stand side by side to Sansa.

But of course they could mislead us and not let us hear what Jon says, but I admit I doubt it, just because an introduction to Sansa would make more sense, if he would walk by Dany’s side and I doubt he would feel the necessity to introduce Dany to Sansa. I think it is just heavy and deep breathing that shows Jon’s nerves.

I think it is interesting that he obviously did not wait for Da€nerys to catch up but wanted to great Sansa first and alone. It changes the dynamic of who stands by whose side.

Thanks for the ask!
